text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Dear @PMOIndia @narendramodi sir , Please don't extend Lockdown after April 15th . If you extend the nation lockdown we as common poor people will commit suicide instead of attacking of Covid19 virus . We are not ready to die because of unemployment, No Food, Mind Pressure..Etc.
